title: Devinci’s new Spartan HP Enduro Bike adopts high-pivot suspension for 2022
content:
Devinci’s Spartan has been a staple on the enduro scene for several years, but it’s getting a major update for 2022 with its new high-pivot suspension.  The redesigned 2022 Spartan HP sticks with the Split-Pivot linkage Devinci has used for years, but the new bike combines that linkage with a high-pivot chainline.
